mapper.select: SELECT product.product_id, product.product_name, product.product_type, product.introduction, product.img_url FROM product, specification WHERE product.product_type = #{product_type} AND specification.specification_type = "trial" AND specification.product_id = product.product_id GROUP BY product.product_id
mapper.delete: delete application,advantage,specification from application,advantage,specification,product where product.product_id = #{product_id} and application.product_id = product.product_id and advantage.product_id = product.product_id and specification.product_id = product.product_id;
mapper.select: select product.product_name, specification.specification_name, specification.specification_type, authority.authority_time from authority, specification, product where authority.user_id = #{user_id} and authority.product_id = specification.product_id and authority.specification_id = specification.specification_id and authority.product_id = product.product_id

select c.product_id, c.title, c.content, c.img_url from application as a, specification as b, application as c where b.specification_type = "trial" and b.product_id = a.product_id and b.product_id = c.product_id
